translated: The Old Man and the Sea (The Old Man and the Sea, in English) is the most famous novel of the American writer Ernest Hemingway, and the last ever published during his lifetime, in 1952.
original: Le Vieil Homme et la Mer (The Old Man and the Sea, en anglais) est le plus célèbre roman de l'écrivain américain Ernest Hemingway, et le dernier qui soit paru de son vivant, en 1952.
